1.content:
It was another Saturday Night at the sports bar, tray after tray of BBQ wings, and fountain Soda, Billiards and darts, Louie's bar was the perfect place to chat between friends but I'm getting ahead of myself The first aspect of the story is the band itself. The Major Allen Project was a local band and it consisted of five members.
First There was Steven Cannete, Steven was what most would consider to be 'White Trash', he lives with his father and younger brother and was pretty infamous around Detriot as a dick.
Next There was Spider, he was the goth of the group, he wasn't the social type to strangers but surprisingly excellent at flirting, everyone called him Spider because he had a birthmark on his neck that looked like an hourglass, he loved it.
Then there was Ricky Akmun, Ricky isn't the type of kind most would hang out with, but he was good for laughs, and he was on hell of a songwriter, he looked up to the rest of the band
There was also Alex Crusan, Most people called him Spade because he knew his way around a deck of cards, he was also rumored to have the fastest hands in Detroit, he had top scores on a lot of arcade games, and his guitar skills were legendary for a kid of his status
Lastly There was Alan Johnson, Everyone Called him Major Because His Band's Name was Major Allen, he was sort of the big brother of the group, he was considered the only one who truly knew The 'MA Sound' meaning he would abandon entire finished songs if they didn't meet his approval.
The five boys were sitting at the table sparring conversations as Major pulled out a piece of paper setting it on the table
"What's That" Spade asked as Major responded
"It's the funding for that tour bus we've been wanting" Major said as the band cheered
"How did you get that much money" Spider asked confused
"I got us a job" Major replied picking up a wing
"A Job?" Steven asked stuffing his face with French Fries as Major handed his the paper
"We're teaching music to a bunch of girls?" Steven replied in confusion
"Hey I don't Like it either but The headmistress said she pays well" Major replied as Alex held up his glass
"A toast to the Project" he said the other 4 did the same
"Then It's settled Let's Hit the road" Major said as the boys stood up putting money on the table leaving the bar heading into an old rusted van and driving off as they came to
1.title: A Teaching Job

11.content:
The van stopped as Steven looked out the window
"Major, Are you sure this is the right place" The redneck asked ripping open a bag of beef jerky as Major Looked at the map
"Yes should be the school" Major said looking at the decrepit building
"Looks like something You'd see in a Hex Girls Video" Spider said getting out followed by the others
"Major Give me the map?" Spade asked as he handed it around as Major sighed
"This should be the right place" Major concluded

"So this is the Right place, probably abandoned though" Spade said as Major put his hand on his shoulder
"Then you go up and ring the doorbell" Major said
"Why?" spade asked obviously nervous
"It's worth checking it out, If no one answers then we go home" Major stated as Spade sighed walking up the path as he placed his finger on the doorbel waiting a few minutes
"You see no one's here can we go home-
Yes, Can I help you " an old voice stated as the door slowly creaked open revealing an old woman
"Yes, Is this The Grimwood Finishing School" Major asked as the woman nodded
"Were The Major Allen Project, We're here about the Music teacher position" Major stated
Great, Please do come in, I'm Miss Grimwood " The old woman said opening the door as the five guys entered observing the place
"With no offense, you should think about calling to have the building touched up" Steven said
"Well It's the way me and the students prefer it" Miss Grimwood said
"So Where are the students?" Major asked
"Their upstairs, you must be eager to get your supplies in, so do you wish to meet them now or Later?" Miss Grimwood asked

After Winnie left through the glass doors, the girls went back to eating and/or talking.
All but Sibella, who had a strange guilty feeling in her gut.
She wasn't sure where it came from, but she did not like it, not one bit.
She looked around at her friends and teachers that where still in the restaurant, feeling fine until she saw a solemn face, a familiar face.
Sibella thought back to their conversation last night, and realized what made her feel so guilty.
There, across the diner, Brevin was sitting alone eating a Reuben with fries and a glass of, general fizz and reading a book.
Sibella stood up and approached Brevin, who didn't make a sound or movement, until sibella sat across from him at his booth.
Brevin raised one eye from his book, which Sibella now saw had the words 'Dantes Inferno', printed on it with a confused look on his face. "Sibella, do you need somethin'?"
"Hey, I guess I just wanted to apologize, you know for last nights behavior", sibella stated.
"You where just trying to help me, and I was a jerk about it, and I'm sorry."
Brevin and sibella sat there for a few minutes until Brevin smiled, "no sibella I'm sorry I shouldn't have tried to get into your personal space that way."
"I guess we where both, in the wrong, huh?", sibella said. "I guess we where", Brevin said.
"So, do you have any hobbies, other than your violin?" "Totally, I also happen to collect knives...."
Meanwhile Winnie had walked back into the diner, and was surprised when, she saw sibella's seat was empty.
"Hey tannis, where's sibella?", Winnie asked. "She's with Mr Brevin", tannis replied. Winnie turned around and saw the two of them laughing, but Winnie focused more on Brevin.
When she first met Brevin he was rough looking, and seemed free.
But now he seemed terribly tense,' does he have women problems?'
When Winnie walked up to the two of them, they stopped and watched her approach, and when she sat next to sibella she saw differing expressions on their faces.
Sibella was smiling, but Brevin had look of concern on his face.
"Sibella was just telling me what kinds of monsters you all are", he said.
"Sibella! You weren't supposed to-", "Winnie Ive already known about the monster thing since last night", Brevin said interrupting Winnie.
Brevin then told Winnie about his conversation with sibella last night, and how sibella apoligized to him and so forth, Winnie simply sat there taking in the whole story.
"Honestley Winnie I didn't expect you to be the werewolf, I figured you where a gargoyle."
"A gargoyle?!", the two girls said in unison, "what? They're awesome, they fly even though they are born of stone."
"Hey guys, just so you know its about time to go", said a voice.
The trio looked and saw a puppy around winnies size.
"Thanks scrappy," sibella said to the young pup.
Brevin stood up and said, " I'm heading out to the car, sibella you should gather the other girls, if you'd please."
"Sure thing", sibella said with a smile.
As the four girls made their way to Brevins car, they noticed something off.
Brevin was standing outside his car not unusual, but he was standing on the passenger side.
"Sibella, can you drive?" "No", sibella replied. "Good, this should be fun here are the keys", he said handing them to her. "I'm certified to give driving exams, consider this practice. Now let's get to the picnic", he said getting in the passenger side.
When the girls got inside Brevin was, holding a clipboard and wearing a tie.
"Hello sibella, my name is Brevin and I will be your driving instructor today", he said in a deep, monotone voice.
"Please note we have passengers in the back seat, so caution is a necessity." "Um, OK", sibella said when she got in the seat.
"Now the first two steps are obvious. Seatbelts, and the ignition, got your seatbelts on girls? Good, now sibella start the car please."
Sibella turned the key in the ignition, and the Cadillac hummed to life.
"Good", Brevin said writing things down on the clipboard.
Brevin then told sibella to put the car in reverse, then lightly hit the gas, she did both perfectley.
"Great! That was wonderful", Brevin said writing on the clipboard again.
"Now put it in drive, then hit the gas smoothley, we need to get with the others", major and shaggy where leaving the parking lot, at that moment.
Sibella quickly and carefully caught up with the others.
"Sibella, your a natural, you know that?", Brevin said.
Sibella blushed, "thanks Mr beard, this is fun", she said.
Brevin then asked sibella a series of questions, keeping his face stoic as sibella answered them.
Brevin also briefed sibella on lights and signs, quickley and efficientley, sibella missed no signs she came to.
"Sibella, you did great I'll save these papers and take you to the DMV tomorrow", Brevin said.
"Thanks Brevin, really I can't wait. Not even daddy has a licence", sibella said, smiling.
Up ahead shaggy and major where turning into a small, lot where a big rusty bus sat. "Fantastic, were here", sibella said.

1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
"Actually I'm pretty curious, so tell me", Jessica said. The stranger looked quite surprised, she wasn't expecting manners.
"Well, I wasn't well expecting manners you undead hündin", she said.
"My name is Shedra. I am on assignment to, watch you and your friends", the redhead added .
"Who hired you to watch us?", Jessica asked angrily.
"My superiors don't tell me things like that. But I'm simply on orders to, observe and report duty", Shedra replied.
"Shedra, you better answer me, or else. So believe me, its better if you answer", Jessica said.
"Wow, you're sounding an awful lot like major right now", Shedra chuckled.
"You know major and his friends...Exactley who are you?", Jessica asked.
"Well, I'm an ex-girlfriend actually", Shedra said. "You dated one of my teachers!?!", Jessica yelled. Shedra almost laughed,
"don't be ridiculous, of course I didn't date your teachers", she said.
"But if you didn't date the band, then that leaves--", Jessica didn't finish before she noticed a bright red dot was seen by the two of them.
It started moving to Shedra, climbing her leg. The it kept going, until it stopped on Shedra's chest. Shedra waited, then ducked yelling Jessica to do the same. *BOOOM*. Jessica saw the tree behind Shedra, now had a splintering hole in it. Jessica was hearing a high-pitched pinging, and nothing else. When it stopped, she and Shedra got to their feet.
"What are you doing here Sonya", a grim yet angry voice said. Jessica then saw Brevin standing next to her. He did not look happy, and he had a large gun in his hands.
"Brevin, you almost killed us!", Jessica yelled.
"I just needed Sonya on her knees, so I could get down without a hitch", Brevin said.
"I had no intentions of, killing anyone." Shedra was standing again, with an unhappy look on her face.
"Jessica, go back to the others. This may get messy", Brevin said. Jessica left, but stopped at the bend then she hid and watched.
Brevin was charging Shedra like a bull and punched her gut. She went down, but gave him a swift uppercut, followed by a series of punches. Brevin grabbed her hand and twisted her arm, she grunted and he clocked her teeth. Shedra back-flipped, then kicked Brevin in his knees. Brevin though, had found an opening and brought his fists down on her skull. Shedra was on the ground, stunned from the last hit. Brevin was gonna strike once more, but Shedra had one last trick up her sleeve. She jumped up, and kissed Brevins lips.
Brevin stopped moving, Shedra punched him and he was down. Shedra took the opprutunity to retreat. Jessica meanwhile, waited a few minutes before she went to check brevin. He was alive, but deeply unconscious. Jessica didn't know what to do, but she did have an idea. She brought her mouth to his to give him air, and she used her hands to steadily push up and down on his chest. It didn't seem to have an effect, so she tried something else. SLAP!!!
"Ow, what was that for Jessica", Brevin said. Jessica wrapped her arms around him, nearly choking Brevin.
"Thank goodness, I thought you were dead dude", she said.
"I thought a Voorhees preffered people dead", Brevin said.
"Well I'm not as completely cruel as most voorhees are", Jessica said. Brevin stood up and almost stumbled, it was obvious to Jessica that he was injured in more than one place.
"We need to get back to the others, Jess. I don't think its as safe at Grimwoods, as it seems. Especially if, Sonya is involved", Brevin said.
"That's weird, she said her name was shedra", Jessica said. "So she changed her name then", Brevin said looking to the distance.

1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
Zina soon finished her dinner savoring every bite as she politely asked to be excused. Zina decided she would check on the groundskeeper before heading upstairs concerned for his being as she walked into the infirmary where Bevin was still sleeping like a stone, Spider was sitting in a chair nearby plucking a few strings on his bass humming a melody as he noticed the reptile standing in the doorway
"How is Mr. Beard doing?" Zina asked formally as Spider took his hand off the neck of his bass reaching for a drink
"He should be up by tomorrow" Spider replied taking a sip from his drink resuming his bass playing as Zina nodded
"Well I will see you tomorrow Mr. Spider" Zina replied bowing her head before walking upstairs to her room placing her key in the door and turning the handle as she entered her room walking to her oversized bed slowly laying down pulling out a comic book from a cardboard box before reading it. Comics were something that Zina always enjoyed since she could remember, it was sort of her escape from reality as she just laid on her soft mattress letting her mind drift in the paper booklet infront of her as she wasted a good hour reading before finishing the story closing the paper book and sliding it in the box as she got off the bed smelling her underarm as she srugged realizing the sweat she built up during gym and her practice with Goonie. Zina was trying to remember why she didn't shower with the others after gym, remembering she was doing something important at the time as she decided now was the time. Zina prepared to take a shower, gathering her nightgown, which was handmade to fit her size and a towel as she walked down the bedroom halls glancing at what the other ghouls were doing. Tanis was building a sandcastle in her room with the sand on her floor, it made her feel more at home, Phanty was reading a magazine which Zina couldn't read the title but had a female monster on the cover, and Winnie was doing some stretching. Zina observed her classmates before eventually arrived at the upstairs bathroom, it was still early in the night but Zina wanted to get her shower over with considering she was a reptile she needed to use warm water as she knocked on the door
"It's being used" a voice said from the other side
"Apologies, I can wait" Zina replied waiting near the door patiently as the door eventually opened and Jessica walked out wearing grey sweatpants and a White T shirt as she walked down the hall and Zina walked in the bathroom locked the door behind her. The air was wet and warm as Zina ran her hand across the foggy mirror getting a glance of her self as she proceeded to undo her pink dress and stepping in the shower humming as she pulled down the squeaky metal knob causing the water to fall as the first seconds made Zina shiver as it made contact on her skin, but the water heated up quickly as Zina reached for a Washcloth scrubbing herself humming a melody

1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
It was 6 in the morning as Elsa woke up getting off the cold metal slab that she called a bed stretching her arms as she turned the lights on, flooding the room with illumination. Elsa's room resembled something you would see from a 50's horror movie. Jars full odds and ends as she opened door being quiet not to wake anyone up as she decided to make herself a small snack as she tiptoed down the stair way making way to the kitchen where she opened the fridge slowly pulling out a carton of milk and walking to the cupboard reaching for a glass. Elsa tilted the milk carton as it poured into the glass filling up. Elsa then picked up a slice of bead and walked to the infirmary where Brevin was still laying
"Oh Sorry did I wake you up?" Elsa asked setting the plate down
"No, I've been up for a while" Brevin replied covering his bandaged side as he got off the medical bed
"Already up and at em" Elsa replied
"My is still in driving conditioning" Brevin replied
"Yeah" Elsa replied as Brevin made his way to the door
"Whoa, where you going?" Elsa asked
"Look Elsa, this is very important, if people are after me, I don't want any of the kids getting hurt, I'm leaving" Brevin replied opening the door with what strength he had as he walked to his totaled car closing the door behind him
"Why would you come back, just to leave again?" Elsa asked
"I needed medical help, there are no hospitals, I'm patched up, I'm going out on the road" Brevin replied
"At least say goodbye to the others" Elsa proposed
"I can't, plus I don't like goodbyes" Brevin responded
"So you're just gonna leave with out saying goodbye?" Elsa said annoyed
"If I don't say goodbye, the girls won't know i left, they'll just think i'm not there" Brevin replied
"What?" Elsa replied confused
"Sounded better in my head" Brevin replied sticking his key in the ignition as the car started and drove down the dirt hill leaving a cloud of smoke behind as Elsa shrugged walking back in the school

"Actually I'm Wondering Why You're making this too easy" Stake said lunging at one the guards snapping his neck as she picked up the gun opening fire on the other before he could even react as she aimed the gun to Thirteen and pulled the trigger to only see some bullet holes in the wall he was gone in a second, she saw a projector and realized she just talking to a hologram. Stake made her way thru the air duct as the alarm blared she crawled to the motor pool as she stopped seeing the open lot. something was wrong, why wasn't anyone guarding the lot, she concluded they were were heading to the armory. Stake took no time getting her car and driving out of the fort crashing thru the wooden fence and skidding into Traffic. Back in the base Thirteen was watching the camera smirking underneath the mask coating is face
"Sir with all respect why did we let her get away?" Mechuzi asked who was operating the projector
"She'll lead us Right to him" Thirteen replied showing a piece of plastic which his men recovered. It was a Guitar pick with the MA logo written on it
1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.title: Flashback

1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
Sonya closed the phone walking out of the bathroom seeing Major talking to what appeared to be a waiter as she tiptoed over to the table fumbling thru the seasoning
"Excuse me sir" Sonya asked as the waiter turned to her
"Yes can I AAHH" He screamed as she busted a shaker of garlic over his head causing his scalp to melt as he started the flesh from his head screaming as Sonya picked up the knife she used to cut her pizza
"Major get to the car" Sonya demanded
"uh.. Okay major said uneasy seeing the dying monster as they rushed to door opening it seeing Jack the white wolf and two men as they busted thru the door
"Going somewhere" Jack said
"Jack, Long time, how's the eye?" Sonya asked as Jack pulled out a huge hunting knife spinning it with his fingers he charged Sonya. Major seeing this decided he had to do something as he picked up the wooden stool approaching the two other men
"Hey assholes" major called out as the two turned as he swung the stool into his face
"Holy Sh--" The guy reacted being cut off by the wooden chair slamming down on him as he fell out cold. Sonya threw the knife into the chest of the other grunt as he groaned. Sonya took the opportunity picking him up and throwing him on the pizza stove as he squirmed on the grill the flesh melting and burning to a crisp
"Shedra, I should've killed you when I Had the chance" Jack replied charging her as Major tossed her the stool which she used to block the knife blow as the two continued to fight as Major rummaged around looking for something that would make a good weapon as he found a rocking pizza cutter. Jack and Sonya were fighting as Sonya blew fire out of her mouth trying to hit Jack " Hey Lucy!" major called out as the wolf turned. major swung the cutter out of anger as it sliced thru Jack's neck. the killer gripped his throat firmly
"Leave her alone, If anyone pisses her off It's gonna be me" Major replied out of pure rage as Jack squirmed. Sonya took her chance kicking him right in the junk as he moved his hands causing his throat to flood with his own blood. major Looked at the dead body dropping the cutter in shock of what he did
"I Can't believe you killed him" Sonya said impressed
"Why, he's dead, i took a man's life?" Major said ashamed
"Major, This is White Jack, he is a mass murderer, he has been our hit-list for years, and YOU just killed him" Sonya said taking a picture
"What's his beef with you?" Major asked
"You've been tagged" Sonya replied
"Now is not the time for sexual jokes!" Major replied
"No Major, You're wanted by Pyramid, They think you're working with this guy, but if you killed him, that can't be true" Sonya replied
"I've never met this guy!" major freaked out
"I know that, Come with me, If we explain what happened, I'm sure they'll believe you" Sonya said
"Okay FINE" Major replied as Sonya popped the trunk of her car reaching for a trash bag as she placed jacks dead body in it, tying the bag as she put it in the trunk
"When they find out you killed White Jack, They might even give you a medal" Sonya said as they got in the car as drove off
1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.title: White Jack

1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
The stingray pulled out of the lot heading down the pavement road. Major was still a little nervous looking at his hand stained red
"Major" Sonya called out of concern as he looked to her
"I can't believe, I actually killed someone" Major replied shaken up
"Everyone reacts that way on their first kill" Sonya stated trying to comfort him
"I Mean I cut his throat, I saw him squirming, trying to put pressure, he knew he was gonna die; That's something I'll Never unsee." Major replied
"Major, He was Gonna kill us...You did the right thing" Sonya replied
"Maybe" Major said as another car dashed behind them, It was a dark Mustang with all terrain tires, the metal frame was made from steel plating , and the windshield was covered in steel grate material as it trailed driving right next to the stingray
"Duck" Sonya whispered to Major has he did so getting on the floor as she opened the glove compartment pulling out a semi automatic as the car was right next to her's
"Pull over now" A voice said belong at to a man whose face was obscured by a hoodie as they both kept driving
"Are you gonna pullover?" Major asked
"Hell no" Sonya replied
"Shouldn't you at least find out who he is?" Major asked
"Just stay down there, that car looks bulletproof... I'm gonna try to side ram" Sonya replied pulling the car to the left as it caved in the right door of the other vehicle as it drove to the right of the mustang
"Major, I hate to ask this, but can you drive stick?" Sonya replied
"I thought you wanted me to stay down here" major said confused
"I need you to drive" Sonya said cocking her gun as they quickly switched seats in mid drive as Sonya began to open fire on the car to little effect
"What's that supposed to do?" Major asked curious at to why she was shooting a bulletproof car
"No Questions, just drive; You'll see an old warehouse to the left pull in and drive thru the wall" Sonya said her voice protected from gunfire as Major saw said building. Sonya pushed a button on her dash as Major swerved in driving thru the back wall which was lowered as the thick metal gate closed as the Mustang crashed as an alarm was heard
"Attention, asshole, you in unauthorized property, If You Don't Leave, I Will Shoot" a voice said coming from magnum on the roof holding an RPG as the Vehicle backed up turning as it continued down the room as he launched a rocket missing on purpose to get a message across. The Mustang stopped in an alleyway as the figure took off his hood revealing to be a dark skinned drow elf and held up a block phone calling Warlust
"Yes Warlust, Pyramid got away with the objective" The elf said
1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.title: High Speed Pursuit

choices: He Needed to Think it over
1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.content:
Sonya left the car as she walked through the halls of Pyramid with Major
"What is this place?" Major asked as he looked around seeing the mutants
"This is pyramid a place where Monsters, Mutants, Machines have come together to protect the balance" Sonya replied putting Major in handcuffs
"Hey, what gives?" Major asked as Sonya was brushing her red hair
"You need to look the part" Sonya replied
"Why are we here?" Major asked nervous
"That hit was called on you, we need to clear it up" Sonya replied as she approached a hall where two grunts held up guns
"At Ease, i wish to Speak with XIII" Sonya said as the grunt pushed a button
"Right this way" He said escorting the two as the sat at a steel table
"Who is this XIII?" Major asked
"someone who you should consider being on his good side" A shadow said from the side of the room as the skull masked man was being escorted as he sat across from them
"Major Allen, I presume" he replied tossing the pick on the table as he looked at the guy in a black suit
"So what do you want with me?" major asked
"Some of my soldiers, good men with families were killed in cold blood by dirt punk Calling Himself Warlust" XIII replied
"Never heard of him?" Major asked
"AT first I thought he was you, but with recent evidence we can account for your location at the time" XIII sated
"But He Did kill White Jack" Sonya stated
"Are they bluffing?" XIII asked
"No Sir, camera footage shows it to be true" A guard said playing a segment of footage on a tv screen behind XIII
"Mr. Allen, anyone who can Kill a Murderous piece of Scum like Jack has a place here, would like to offer you a spot in our group" XIII said as major looked at him
1113221122221112121222211221112111122112.title: Meeting XIII

11132211222211121212222112211122.content:
Sibella woke early the next morning, still feeling ungodly tired. She had spent a portion of the previous night, crying herself to sleep. She put her robe on, brushed her hair and went down to help Grimwood with breakfast. When Sibella reached the kitchen, miss G asked Sibella to reach in the fridge for eggs. Sibella was fine with it, and brought the eggs to her.
"Sibella, is everything OK? You look like you were crying", miss grimwood said.
"Really miss Grimwood, everything's fine", Sibella said.
Breakfast wasn't eventful, the girls are talking but Sibella didn't hear them. After breakfast was over, the girls were conversing on the way to class. Sibella stood from them though, she walked further behind them. Sibella didn't feel like chit-chatting. In class, miss Grimwood said to draw something to signify what they felt in their hearts. Sibella knew this was a ruse, miss grimwood wants to see what's got Sibella down. Sibella drew a happy image, her and Scooby Doo sitting on the front stairs.
Music class was almost just as slow, major was describing the different types of guitars. He also talked about, the differences of electric and acoustic. The other girls raised hands and asked questions, the band answering swiftly. Gym class was next of course, and the girls started running around the school. Then they lifted weights, an easy task for most girls. Then lastly, they practiced volleyball. Sibella struggled as her serve was off. Then they hit the showers, after so they were done for the day.
Sibella was alone under a tree, she was doodling and watching Steven, major and Brevin chop wood. Brevin tossed logs in the air, then chopped each in half. Then major and Steve would split those halves, and shaggy, Scooby, and scrappy carried the wood to the pile. 'Boys', Sibella thought as this method was dumb and dangerous. It was efficient though, the boys finished in about 30 minutes.
"Hey, something wrong?", a voice said. Sibella looked up to see Brevin standing next to her. Sibella figures someone should know, so she'll talk in private with the groundskeeper.
"I'm having boy trouble", she said. Brevin sat down with her, and closed his eyes.
"Whose the guy?", he asked.
"Its spider", Sibella replied.
"OK then, so what's the trouble?", Brevin asked. Sibella told Brevin the truth, knowing she won't get the right help otherwise.
"Interesting, so spider ran because your a girl ghoul. Your sad because, you believe as such he won't like you, the real you", Brevin said.
"Yeah, wait aren't you scared that I'm a monster?", Sibella asked.
"This isn't the first time I've met real monsters", Brevin said to a surprised Sibella.
"You've met real monsters before?", Sibella asked.
"Yes", he said flatly. The pair spent the best part of the next hour under the tree, talking and laughing. Miss Grimwood smiled, as she watched from the window.
Brevin took out a small box from his pocket, with a thoughtful look on his face.
"Sibella, I used to have a love of my own, we spent much together. But, sadly it did not last. We broke up only a week before the 1-year anniversary of our 1st date", Brevin said.
"Why would you tell me?", Sibella asked.
"To celebrate, I bought a, $1,800 necklace for her. After we broke up, I had no one to give it to. But I decided to give it to someone special, so I want you to have it", Brevin said holding out the box.
Sibella opened the box and gasped, the necklace was gorgeous. The chain was cord-thick and made of gold. The piece was a cutout heart made of gold also. Inside the heart, was a cursive style S lined with diamonds.
"Its beautiful, I've never seen anything like it", Sibella said.
"Brevin I love it, I owe you one", Sibella said. Sibella put the necklace on and went inside.
'She's a good kid', Brevin thought as he went back in to see what else Miss G needed.
11132211222211121212222112211122.title: Opening Up to The GK

1113222.content:
"Sorry girls", Major said,'but this is a practice session, you can't listen." The girls walked away sadly, and in defeat. They joined the rest of the students in the den, all who were doing their own thing.
"They didn't want, us listening", Winnie said in defeat.
"Its fine Winnie, well get a chance soon, I'm sure", Sibella said.
"OK girls, gather 'round", miss grimwood said.
"What is it miss Grimwood?", Winnie asked.
"Would one of you girls like to, accompany Mr rogers to the airport? He needs to pick up, the new groundskeeper, who is just getting back to town today", miss Grimwood said.
"Sure I shall take up the honor of this traveling commission", Mary said.
"Thank you Mary, Shaggy is just getting his keys", miss Grimwood said as Mary walked to the front door where shaggy was waiting.
"Ready to go , Mary?", shaggy asked.
"Indeed Mr Rogers, but may I ask of you, your verification to allow me to interject an inquiry of earthly matters?", Mary said as they stepped off the porch.
"You wanna ask a question?", Shaggy asked.
"Affirmative", Mary stated. "OK then, go ahead", shaggy said as they buckled up.
"What is, an airport?", Mary asked.
"Oh an airport is, well think of it as a spaceport that is restricted to one planet. Planes can go maybe a bit over, 35000 feet. Planes get you from one place to another place on earth in a matter of hours, it takes a while but you can't beat the view", shaggy said as they were passing calloways. As they were driving Mary, and shaggy talked a great deal.
"OK were here mary, get that sign in the back please", shaggy said. Mary turned, and for the first time she noticed a white sign in the back seat. When she got it out of the car, the words 'Brevin Beard' where visible.
"Am I to assume this to be the groundskeepers name?", Mary asked as shaggy nodded. They walked into the airport and saw a clock that said, 10:35 am.
"Only 25 minutes until the plane lands", shaggy said. Mary and shaggy went to the terminal they were looking for, stopping for snacks and restroom breaks on the way. Mary looked at the clock, 11am, a loud noise was heard it continuous for a minute or two before ceasing.
"Is that the plane landing Mr rogers?", Mary asked. Shaggy noodded, then held up the sign as people got off and were collecting their belongings. Eventually a tired, irritated, looking teenager with glasses and a black hoodie got off and looked directory at the sign. He walked to collect , four identical blue bags, that snapped together and had wheels. This darkley dressed figure made Mary uneasy, but she knew somehow he was who they were looking for. The figure walked up to shaggy, and showed an I'd. Shaggy smiled and held a hand out,the figure took it but said nothing. Brevin silentley guided them to a counter just inside the entrance, where he took out some papers and received a set of car keys. As soon as Brevins luggage was in the van, he held up his hand in a one moment gesture and ran off. A few minutes later, he returned in a white car smaller than shaggys van. Brevin gave a gesture for shaggy to lead the way, and they left the air port.
1113222.title: To the Airport

11132221.content:
Shaggy could feel his stomach rumble, he looked for a restaurant and saw a sign. The sign said, "Deeno's bar and grill". Shaggy turned into the parking lot, and Brevin followed suit.
"Table for three?", the waitress asked when they where inside.
"Yeah, thanks Dinah", Brevin said finally speaking.
"Right this way, Mr Beard", Dinah said in reply.
"Everyone here seems to know you", Mary said.
"Yeah, I come here a lot actually", Brevin said to her. After they ordered their drinks, they browsed the menu. Brevin decided what he wanted almost instantley, and set the menu down. Brevin asked about the other students, and shaggy explained that there are ten students in all.
"Believe me the girls are sweet really", shaggy explained to him. Just then, a group of bikers burst in demanding money, threatening people with knives. Brevin was calm as the bikers were surrounded by cowboys and rednecks, all with baseballs, guns, or knives.
"Nobody threatens this bar ever", Brevin said. Immediately the bikers were all taken down, and Brevin told the owner to call the cops. Shaggy and Mary watched these events unfold with wide eyes, and open mouths. Brevin then sat down again, and ordered his food as if nothing happened. When the waitress had gone, Brevin told shaggy and Mary, that 90% of all customers are regulars who took an oath to protect this restaurant.
Once they had gone, they drove down the road and eventually passed calloway school. The other students, who were playing ball in the yard had watched the two vehicles park. But they watched the white Cadillac more, staring with interest as the groundskeeper got out of the car. Shaggy introduced, the girls to Brevin, and Brevin to the girls. As they approached the front door, Brevin stopped and looked at a van that was, half hidden.
"I swear I've seen that van before", Brevin said. When they reached the door, miss grimwood was waiting to greet him.
"Now perhaps, you would like to meet the music teachers?", miss grimwood asked.
"Sure, I'll do that what are they like?", Brevin asked.
"See for yourself", miss grimwood said.
11132221.title: Lunch Plus Small Talk and a Fight

choices: Stay in the view of the girls.
111322211.content:
"So Brevin, do you have any friends of your own?", miss Grimwood asked as she, Brevin,Winnie, and Sibella all walked towards the music room.
"Not a lot, but there is one set of friends that I really look up to", Brevin said.
"They sound very inspiring, you must care a lot for them", Sibella said.
"Those five, they're the brothers I never had. Plus, they are awesome with music", Brevin said.
"That sounds like the music teachers, right Sibella?", Winnie said to her classmate. Sibella merely nodded in response.
Meanwhile, the band had finished rehearsing, and were now doing they're own things. Major, was just going over some chords. Ricky and Alex, were eating chips and playing poker. Steven was thinking of Winnie, while sipping on a General Fizz. Spider in the while had taken refuge in the corner, tuning his bass while listening to a sports game with the radio on low.
*Knock**knock*, "who is it?", Major asked.
"Its miss Grimwood, I have a couple of students with me. We're wondering if you boys wanna, meet the new groundskeeper?", miss Grimwood asked.
"I'm not doing anything", Steven said getting up. When Steven opened the door, miss Grimwood said the new groundskeeper went down stairs.
"Alright, that's fine", Steven said while walking away. Just as Steve and Winnie where reaching the last stair, Steven heard a familiar-seeming voice.
"But my point is, never go to western Europe without a translator", a voice said followed by laughter.
"That voice, Winnie that voice is familiar sounding", Steven said to the wolf chick.
"Really? That's the groundskeepers voice", Winnie said.
"What does he drive, do you know Winnie?", Steven asked her.
"He drives a white, 4-door Cadillac. I saw the license plate to it was, M-J-R-A-L-N-1", Winnie said to the shocked drummer.
"Winnie, the license plate says,'Major Allen #1', but it can't be. Winnie we only know one person, who drives a car like that", Steven said to her.
They walked into the living room, that's when Steven saw him.
"Brevin!", Steven almost shouted the word, the groundskeeper looked at Steve but could not believe it.
"Steven, man why are you-- oh No way. You and the guys are the music teachers!", he also almost shouted.
"You guys know each other?", the girls all asked at the same time.
"Oh me and the band go way back", Brevin said.
"Come on, I'm sure the band will like seeing you again", Steve said going upstairs with Brevin following.
111322211.title: Brevin Knows MA?
